project.description: JSON Schema Generator for OpenShift v3 Origin API Objects

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd ${WORKSPACE} godep restore
mkdir -p $GOPATH/src/github.com/csrwng ln -s $JENKINS_HOME/jobs/origin-schema-generator/workspace $GOPATH/src/github.com/csrwng/origin-schema-generator
set +e ERROR=$(go get -u github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/ 2>&1 >/dev/null) set -e
if [[ $ERROR == *"no buildable Go source files"* ]] then echo "Ignoring \'buildable Go source files\' warnings!" fi
godep update github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/... go get -u github.com/openshift/origin/ godep update github.com/openshift/origin/... godep go build ./cmd/generate/generate.go ./generate > kube-schema-temp.json cat kube-schema-temp.json | python -mjson.tool > kube-schema.json
git clone https://github.com/rawlingsj/fabric8.git mv kube-schema.json fabric8/components/kubernetes-api/src/main/kubernetes/api/doc/kube-schema.json cd fabric8 mvn clean install
